original: @243b # // rgya gar skad du /

analyzed: de la btud de ji srid mnyes byas man ngag bri //

original: rang nyams myong bas dug zin sgrub pa rjes dran zung //
analyzed: rang nyams myong bas dug zin sgrub pa rjes dran zung //

analyzed: rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / stag la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ri bo'am /

original: stan bde ba la 'dug nas /

translated: Then, sitting on a comfortable seat,

original: de nas pam las padma'i lte ba la /

analyzed: rin po che sbyi bo'i steng du na yod pa'o //

original: de ltar bdud la sogs pa rlog par byed pa can du bdag nyid rnam par bsam mo //
analyzed: de ltar bdud la sogs pa rlog par byed pa can du bdag nyid rnam par bsam mo //

original: de nas rang gi snying ga'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas /
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying ga'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas /
translated: Then light radiates from the H≈™·πÄ at one's heart,

original: snying ga las 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: snying ga las 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de /

original: dza: h'um bam ho: @244b bzhis dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / tha mi dad pa'i phyir dbang du bya'o //
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: @244b bzhis dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / tha mi dad pa'i phyir dbang du bya'o //

analyzed: de'i rjes la sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gis sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /

original: aom dang a'a: dang h'um mthing ga dang / dmar po dang / dkar po'i rim pas spyi bo dang / snying ga dang / mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rnam par bsam mo //

translated: one should visualize the blue, red, and white O·πÇ, ƒÄ·∏§, and H≈™·πÇ, respectively, on the crown, heart, and throat, on sun ma·πá·∏çalas.

original: de nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas lag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pas dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: de nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas lag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pas dbang bskur ro //
translated: Then, the Buddhas of the three times confer empowerment with the vase of nectar in their hands, marked with the five-tined wrathful vajra.

original: nyung du 'dod pa rnams kyis ni /
analyzed: nyung du 'dod pa rnams kyis ni /
translated: Those who desire a brief [version] should recite the following:

original: aom n'e l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni hri da ya ma h'a kro dha s'a dha h'um phat ces snying po'i sngags yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o //

original: ngag gi brjod pas kyang skyo bar gyur na /
analyzed: ngag gi brjod pas kyang skyo bar gyur na /

original: bla ma mnyes byas dang ldan snying rjer bcas //
analyzed: bla ma mnyes byas dang ldan snying rjer bcas //

analyzed: taksha ka yis zin par gyur pa yang //
